    • Constructor Detail

      • Fits

        public Fits()
     throws FitsConfigurationException
        Default, no-arg constructor. FITS configuration file expected in default location with FITS_HOME either default location or set by environment variable.
        Throws:
        FitsConfigurationException - If there is a problem configuring FITS.

      • Fits

        public Fits(java.lang.String fits_home)
     throws FitsConfigurationException
        Constructor with path to alternate FITS_HOME.
        Parameters:
        fits_home - Full path to home directory of FITS installation. NOTE: If FITS_HOME set as environment variable this argument has no effect.
        Throws:
        FitsConfigurationException - If there is a problem configuring FITS.

      • Fits

        public Fits(java.lang.String fits_home,
            java.io.File fitsXmlConfig)
     throws FitsConfigurationException
        Constructor with alternate FITS_HOME and alternate FITS configuration file.
        Parameters:
        fits_home - Full path to home directory of FITS installation. NOTE: If FITS_HOME set as environment variable this argument has no effect.
        fitsXmlConfig - File containing FITS configuration.
        Throws:
        FitsConfigurationException - If there is a problem configuring FITS.

      • examine

                   throws FitsException
        Throws:

      • resetToolOutputAfterExaminingInput

        protected void resetToolOutputAfterExaminingInput(boolean resetToolOutput)
        Default is that the output of each tool is reset after gathering the results in the examine() method. This method should only be used for testing purposes.
        Parameters:
        resetToolOutput - false will change default functionality of resetting each tool's output after running examine().
        See Also:
        Tool.resetOutput()

      • getToolbelt

        public ToolBelt getToolbelt()
